solution_line_template: Juvy planted {parsley_rows} + {rosemary_rows} = <<{parsley_rows}+{rosemary_rows}={non_chive_rows}>>{non_chive_rows} rows with parsley and rosemary.
So, {total_rows} - {non_chive_rows} = <<{total_rows}-{non_chive_rows}={chive_rows}>>{chive_rows} rows will be planted with chives.
Therefore, {chive_rows} x {plants_per_row} = <<{chive_rows}*{plants_per_row}={total_chives}>>{total_chives} chives will be planted.
